Text:
Thanks but does not work !
when you try to save and apply the changes it says its doing it then says creating iso but nothing happens and it errors and closes every time

Update: used Win 7 x64 Ultimate with setup files extracted to a folder named "new" (wont work if you have spaces in folder name) and it finally worked.
It changed setup images and activated with daz loader but did not change logon or desktop wallpaper
